sentences.en: A : Did you see the new girl working at the checkout?
sentences.cn: 你看 咿 那?在收泫台工作的新?女孩?

sentences.en: All bugs are to do with the customer creation and checkout process.
sentences.cn: 所有的错误都是跟客户创造和检测过程.

sentences.en: At the supermarket, Candida chose the shortest checkout line.
sentences.cn: 在超级市场里, 坎迪德选一条最短的结账队来排.

sentences.en: Checkout cashier is for the guests clearing fees and checkout.
sentences.cn: 收银退房实现客人结算各项用度并退房.

sentences.en: Checkout page images seems overlapping, CSS skill required for fix this errors.
sentences.cn: 结帐页面图像似乎重叠, CSS的技术需要解决这个错误.

sentences.en: Don't checkout hundreds or thousands of files at one time.
sentences.cn: 不要一次性签出成百上千的文件.

sentences.en: Don't make me re - enter that information at the time of checkout.
sentences.cn: 别让我在结账的时候重新输入信息.

sentences.en: Drinks, candy, gum, media - all right by the checkout counter.
sentences.cn: 饮料, 糖果, 口香糖, 报纸杂志 —— 都在付款台边.

sentences.en: Good stores open nw checkout lanes when the lanes get too long.
sentences.cn: 当结帐队伍太长时,好的商家会再开放新的收银柜台.

sentences.en: One page checkout - It directly creates password for user and email.
sentences.cn: 结帐一页 - 它直接创造了用户和电子邮件密码.

sentences.en: The company has advanced production checkout equipment, perfect quality assurance series.
sentences.cn: 公司拥有先进的生产检测设备, 完善的质量保证系列.

sentences.en: The idea must undergo the checkout of experiment.
sentences.cn: 观念必须经得起实验的检验。

sentences.en: We have advanced and complete casting, Seiko apply installing and checkout equipment.
sentences.cn: 拥有先进完备的铸造 、 精工、涂装及检测设备.

sentences.en: When you have finished, you go to the checkout.
sentences.cn: 当你选好后, 你去结帐台.

sentences.en: You may take that to the checkout counter, madam, and good luck to ya.
sentences.cn: 你现在可以去收款处了, 女士, 祝你好运.
